src:
Watch: Vettel's classic trick with Mercedes fans
03 Nov 2019, 12:39 by Matt Gretton

Sebastian Vettel is back to his usual self on the F1 race track and it seems as if he's back to his usual self in the paddock as well. The Ferrari driver meets up with a young fan who is wearing the wrong hat for his liking.
